mapper.select: SELECT d.id AS display_info_id, p.description AS product_description, IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(rc.score),1),0) AS average_score, COUNT(rc.id) as comment_count FROM display_info AS d INNER JOIN product AS p ON d.product_id = p.id INNER JOIN reservation_user_comment AS rc ON p.id = rc.product_id WHERE d.id = #{displayInfoId}
